description.zh-cn: 一种政治哲学，建立于马克思列宁主义之上，认为毛主义是马克思列宁主义的更高阶段。
description.en: A political philosophy that builds upon Marxism-Leninism and considers Maoism to be its higher stage.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发展而来的马克思主义理论，被马列毛主义者认为是马克思列宁主义的新阶段。
description.en: A variant of Marxism–Leninism derived from the teachings of Mao Zedong, considered by MLM proponents as a new stage of Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 由列宁和斯大林发展的马克思主义理论，是20世纪多数社会主义国家的官方意识形态。
description.en: A communist ideology developed by Vladimir Lenin and Joseph Stalin, which was the official ideology of most socialist states in the 20th century.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党官方意识形态之一，被认为是马克思列宁主义与中国革命实践相结合的产物。
description.en: One of the official ideologies of the Chinese Communist Party, considered the product of combining Marxism-Leninism with the concrete practice of the Chinese revolution.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、经济学家、社会学家、政治理论家、记者和革命社会主义者，马克思主义的创始人之一。
description.en: A German philosopher, economist, historian, sociologist, political theorist, journalist, and socialist revolutionary, one of the founders of Marxism.

description.zh-cn: 德国哲学家、社会科学家、记者和商人，与卡尔·马克思共同创立了马克思主义。
description.en: A German philosopher, social scientist, journalist, and businessman who co-founded Marxist theory with Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯革命家、政治家和政治理论家，列宁主义的创始人。
description.en: A Russian revolutionary, politician, and political theorist, founder of Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 格鲁吉亚革命家和苏联政治家，在20世纪20年代中期至1953年去世期间领导苏联。
description.en: A Georgian revolutionary and Soviet politician who led the Soviet Union from the mid-1920s until his death in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治理论家、诗人和共产主义领袖，是中华人民共和国的缔造者之一。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, political theorist, poet, and founding father of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪60年代，中国共产党和苏联共产党之间关于意识形态和政策的公开论战，导致国际共产主义运动的分裂。
description.en: The public debate and ideological split between the Communist Party of China and the Communist Party of the Soviet Union during the 1960s, leading to a schism in the international communist movement.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的在中国发生的社会政治运动。
description.en: A sociopolitical movement in China launched and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 一个毛派国际组织，旨在团结世界各地的马列毛主义政党和组织。
description.en: An international Maoist organization that aimed to unite Marxist-Leninist-Maoist parties and organizations around the world.

nodes.id: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）

zh-cn: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）的指导思想，被认为是马列毛主义在尼泊尔的发展。
description.en: The guiding ideology of the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist Centre), considered a development of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism in Nepal.

description.zh-cn: 秘鲁共产党（光辉道路）的意识形态，被其追随者认为是马列毛主义的普遍适用性贡献。
description.en: The ideology of the Shining Path, considered by its followers to be a universally applicable contribution to Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

nodes.id: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

zh-cn: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论
en: Theory of Continuing Revolution under the Dictatorship of the Proletariat

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提出的关于在社会主义社会中防止资本主义复辟的理论，是文化大革命的理论基础。
description.en: A theory developed by Mao Zedong regarding the prevention of capitalist restoration in a socialist society, which formed the theoretical basis for the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和毛主义政党的政治、组织和领导方法，核心思想是“从群众中来，到群众中去”。
description.en: The political, organizational and leadership method developed by the Chinese Communist Party and Maoist political parties, summarized as 'from the masses, to the masses'.

description.zh-cn: 列宁主义的一项原则，主张由一个由“先锋队”成员组成的紧密、集中的共产党来领导无产阶级革命。
description.en: A principle of Leninism which advocates for a communist party composed of a small, centralized, and disciplined group of 'vanguard' members to lead the proletarian revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东提出的一种军事战略，强调维持人民群众支持、采取游击战术，并以农村包围城市。
description.en: A military strategy developed by Mao Zedong that emphasizes maintaining the support of the populace, employing guerrilla warfare tactics, and encircling cities from the countryside.

description.zh-cn: 于2022年成立的毛派国际组织。
description.en: An international Maoist organization founded in 2022.

nodes.id: 厄瓜多尔共产党—红太阳

zh-cn: 厄瓜多尔共产党—红太阳
en: Communist Party of Ecuador – Red Sun

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义被认为是毛主义的更高发展阶段。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism is considered a higher stage of development of Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 毛主义被其拥护者认为是马克思列宁主义的第三个和更高的阶段。
description.en: Maoism is considered by its proponents to be the third and higher stage of Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 在1980年代，秘鲁共产党（光辉道路）最早提出“马克思列宁毛主义”一词，主张其为马克思列宁主义的更高更新阶段。
description.en: In the 1980s, the Shining Path was the first to propose the term 'Marxism-Leninism-Maoism', arguing that it was a new and higher stage of Marxism-Leninism.

description.zh-cn: 1993年12月26日，革命国际主义运动发表文章《马克思列宁毛主义万岁！》，正式采纳并推广“马克思列宁毛主义”这一术语。
description.en: On December 26, 1993, the Revolutionary Internationalist Movement published the document 'Long Live Marxism-Leninism-Maoism!', formally adopting and promoting the term.

description.zh-cn: 1960年代的中苏论战促使中国共产党在国内强调和推广“马克思列宁主义、毛泽东思想”。
description.en: The Sino-Soviet split in the 1960s prompted the Communist Party of China to emphasize and promote 'Marxism-Leninism, Mao Zedong Thought' domestically.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，中国官方媒体将毛泽东思想宣传为“当代最高水平的马克思列宁主义”。
description.en: In the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, Chinese state media promoted Mao Zedong Thought as 'the highest level of contemporary Marxism-Leninism'.

relationships.source: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论

description.zh-cn: 无产阶级专政下继续革命的理论是文化大革命的核心理论基础和指导思想。
description.en: The theory of continuing revolution under the dictatorship of the proletariat was the core theoretical basis and guiding ideology of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 群众路线理论以列宁的先锋队理论为基础发展而来。
description.en: The Mass Line theory is based on Lenin's theory of the vanguard party.

description.zh-cn: 列宁是先锋队理论的提出者和主要阐述者。
description.en: Lenin was the originator and main exponent of the theory of the vanguard party.

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）宣称其指导思想“普拉昌达道路”是对马列毛主义的发展。
description.en: The Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist Centre) claims its guiding ideology, 'Prachanda Path', is a development of Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

relationships.source: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）将其意识形态总结为“普拉昌达道路”。
description.en: The Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist Centre) summarized its ideology as 'Prachanda Path'.

description.zh-cn: 秘鲁共产党（光辉道路）将自己的意识形态称为“马克思列宁毛主义、贡萨罗思想”。
description.en: The Shining Path calls its own ideology 'Marxism-Leninism-Maoism, Gonzalo Thought'.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义包含卡尔·马克思的思想。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism incorporates the thought of Karl Marx.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义包含恩格斯的思想。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism incorporates the thought of Friedrich Engels.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义包含列宁的思想。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism incorporates the thought of Vladimir Lenin.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义包含斯大林的思想。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism incorporates the thought of Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 马克思列宁毛主义包含毛泽东的思想。
description.en: Marxism-Leninism-Maoism incorporates the thought of Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其共产党/马列是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Turkey/Marxist–Leninist is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 土耳其毛主义共产党是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Maoist Communist Party of Turkey is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 阿富汗共产党（毛主义）是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Afghanistan (Maoist) is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 伊朗共产党（马列毛）是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Iran (Marxist-Leninist-Maoist) is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 印度共产党（毛主义）是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of India (Maoist) is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 东孟加拉无产阶级党是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Proletarian Party of East Bengal is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

relationships.source: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔共产党（毛主义中心）是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist Centre) is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾共产党是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of the Philippines is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 美国革命共产党是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Revolutionary Communist Party, USA is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

description.zh-cn: 巴西共产党 (2022年)是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Brazil (2022) is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.

relationships.source: 厄瓜多尔共产党—红太阳

description.zh-cn: 厄瓜多尔共产党—红太阳是支持马列毛主义的政党之一。
description.en: The Communist Party of Ecuador – Red Sun is one of the political parties that supports Marxism-Leninism-Maoism.
